channel.title: Msn Remote Control for simple coding pl0x
channel.description: Im a starter at coding moparscape private servers, could someone add footydefender@hotmail.co.uk which is my email to show me how to code npc into varrock and shops stuff like that i will be really greatfull. To show me you can use remote assistance so you get control of my mouse and can then go and show me how to do it, Thanks :D
